metadata.title: CVE-2016-5417 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Memory leak in the __res_vinit function in the IPv6 name server managementcode in libresolv in GNU C Library (aka glibc or libc6) before 2.24 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) byleveraging partial initialization of internal resolver data structures.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5417` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

glibc-source - 2.23-0ubuntu6
libc-bin - 2.23-0ubuntu6
libc6 - 2.23-0ubuntu6
libc6-amd64 - 2.23-0ubuntu6
libc6-armel - 2.23-0ubuntu6
libc6-i386 - 2.23-0ubuntu6
libc6-pic - 2.23-0ubuntu6
libc6-ppc64 - 2.23-0ubuntu6
libc6-s390 - 2.23-0ubuntu6
libc6-x32 - 2.23-0ubuntu6
locales - 2.23-0ubuntu6
locales-all - 2.23-0ubuntu6
multiarch-support - 2.23-0ubuntu6
nscd - 2.23-0ubuntu6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glibc package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.23-0ubuntu6').
